content: हेवाकः Ardent or intense desire, eagerness; (this word, like the word लटभ <ab>q. v.</ab>, is used only by later writers like Kalhaṇa, Bilhaṇa, and is probably derived from Persian or Arabic); अस्मिन्नासीत्तदनु निविडाश्लेषहेवाकलीलावेल्लद्वाहुक्वणितवलया संततं राजलक्ष्मीः <ls>Vikr. 18. 101</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> हेवाकिन् below.
